values: I... think I have amnesia and I don't really understand why... It's a good thing I broadcast pretty much every goddamn thought I have onto the Internet so that I can remind myself of who I am daily a la The Notebook antero AND retrograde amnesia like, my mind is foggy and burned out and nothing people tell me sticks anymore, and when thinking about the past I can only recall a very basic rough outline that is probably misremembered anyways, and trying to replay particular scenes or focus on details is impossible feels like my brain is surrounded in cotton balls so anyways, storing my identity and basically my entire consciousness and ego externally on a computer like some gay cyberpunk shit sounds sweet at first, but i'm concerned that if I didn't have crappy blog posts and pictures of myself on facebook to stare at for hours every day I would eventually forget who I was and revert to some kind of zombified mindless primate laying around his cage all day scratching and hooting every now and again NOT THAT I DON'T DO THAT ANYWAYS but I mean, I would go completely feral without the illusion of being socially active and visible in the public eye that the internet so cruelly provides additionally, relying on the internet to remember things for me makes me pretty paranoid considering how easy it would be for someone to change information around without me even realizing it... How can I be sure i'm the one that wrote all this stuff when I don't even remember writing any of it??? Spooky! So, I dunno why i'm like this now or maybe if I was always like this and just never realized it until recently, but this computer aided thinking is a terrible crutch that I gotta get rid of! If somebody decided to HAXX my computer and set it up so that they could remote access my desktop and see what i'm looking at on the internet in real time, they would be able to literally read my mind as I constantly google and wikipedia trifling facts and trivia that i'm too lazy to try and remember on my own I'm with Prince, FUCK the internet!

SoOOoooo, I have been reminded by a number of people that I still have a livejournal so I guess i'll start updating again, though I am shocked to discover that it has only been a year since the last time i've been lj-active. For some reason I was under the impression that it's been much longer. How odd. I don't really have much to report since last entry, other than I think I must have hit my head really hard between this entry and that one because i've been feeling awfully... concussed for at least the last couple of months nothing but big ????? from me, folks i'm finally living out my dreams of being a brain-damaged vegetable how thrilling - - -

some men measure themselves by how well they can oppress other men

and some men measure themselves by how well they can rebel against their personal oppressors

I have always prided myself in my tendency to rebel against rebellion, but recognizing that, I wanna rebel against that too

so where does that leave me?

how do I literally rebel against myself?

Manga Ernest Hemingway is my Christmas gift to the internet ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ I'm not gonna be sad to see 2008 go, and lets hope 2k9 is a bit better huh? Plus, i'm finally getting off my ass and writing movie scripts, so, we'll see

I refuse to make a post about Christmas!

I hate Christmas!


here is something non-related

<lj-embed id="40"/>

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ So far the hardest thing for me about quitting cigarettes has been that now that I don't really go out anymore, i've been trying to watch every episode of the x-files. Basically, I hate watching the Cigarette Smoking Man, because he never finishes a goddamn cigarette! Like, he only finishes about half of one, tosses it, and immediately goes for another one. It is a really weird and maddening character trait!
you see, it's funny because that's what his name is (I didn't name him)

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ While digging my car out of the snow bank, courtesy of the blizzard, I found a fifty dollar ticket under the windshield wiper for "Snow Emergency"??? What the fuck does that even mean? Fifty dollars???? I don't even have five! Fuck!
~ ~ ~ ~ I would be a criminal profiler, if I thought I could pass the FBI psychiatric exam and background check

a totally serious question:

how can I tell if I'm getting Prozac induced psychosis?

and, if that's really just anti-pharmaceutical propaganda

how can I tell if I'm getting regular psychosis?

~~~

because I'm slipping, man, things are getting weird and unstable in a scary way




EDIT: And as far as these last couple of months on the drug goes, to use an analogy, life before was like being locked up in a prison of generalized anxiety and angst, forever staring listlessly through the iron bars of the cell window, longing for the free life, and now that i'm finally out, I find myself on the streets cold and starving, lying in a gutter without even a newspaper to cover myself with, and i'm wishing I was back in the prison, where at least I had three hots and a cot.

I mean, if I'm gonna be melodramatic about the whole thing
~ ~ ~ Also, after two days of non-stop sweeping and scrubbing and spider stomping, my room is like Howard Hughes sterile right now.

Ironically, as soon as I said I would go a full day without the internet, those bastards shut it off!

Who has that kind of money to pay the bill every month??? Guess it's time to find something else to do for a while.

Actually the real irony is that, even without the internet at home, I found a way to not stay off the internet for a full day like I said I would. A real addict always finds a way! I'm gonna steal  and pawn a TV from my own family just to squeeze another month from Wide Open West.
time flies when you're not having any fun

I wake up every morning covered in spider bites






or are they centipede bites

Woah, Let The Right One In was like if Suehiro Maruo was Swedish and filmed a live action movie It was a legitimately creepy vampire movie that didn't go out of it's way to say "DUDE ARENT VAMPIRES FUCKIN BADASS AND SWEET DUDE YEAH" like Twilight or Underworld or 30 Days of Night or something, and I liked that. American horror movies these days are too goddamn White Wolf for my tastes anymore - - - - - And on the subject of Suehiro Maruo:
I wear shoes two sizes too big, to trick the cops at my murder scenes
I'm not just drifting out of touch with everyone I know, i'm Tokyo Drifting out of touch with everyone I know
So, what was I thankful for this thanksgiving??? Nothing! I don't have anything to be thankful for!!! :C

The rules...
I. Pick 15 of your favorite movies.
II. Go to IMDb and find a quote from each movie. (or maybe you know them by heart?)
III. Post them here for everyone to guess.
IV. Strike it out when someone guesses correctly, and put who guessed it and the movie.

But whoever follows me and the river, will win untold riches. But whoever deserts...</s>
